settings.question: What is MISU?
settings.answer: MISU is a modern wellness brand offering premium grain-based drinks inspired by traditional Korean recipes, crafted for the conscious, health-focused individual.

settings.question: Where are your products made?
settings.answer: Our products are rooted in Seoul's rich culinary heritage and crafted in Los Angeles using carefully sourced, high-quality ingredients.

settings.question: Are your drinks vegan-friendly?
settings.answer: Yes, all MISU drinks are 100% plant-based and suitable for vegan diets. We use no animal-derived ingredients in any of our formulations.

settings.question: How do I manage my subscription?
settings.answer: You can manage your subscription through your account dashboard. There you can pause, skip, or cancel at any time with no penalties.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the US. Express shipping options are available at checkout for faster delivery.

settings.title: INQUIRIES
settings.subtitle: Find answers to commonly asked questions
settings.no_results_text: No questions found. Try a different search term.
